element.short: Exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues
element.definition: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required.
element.requirements: Typically these information codes are required to support the services rendered or the adjudication of the services rendered.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
